sentences: Arvasin, et kompress võiks haigele jalale abi tuua.
Kui ei ole surmatõbi, siis saab ikka viinast abi.
Ta on endale abiks otsinud. - I have looked for help for myself.
context: The word 'arvasin' is the first person singular past tense form of the Estonian verb 'arvama', which means to think, assume, or guess. It is formed by adding the '-n' ending indicating first person singular and using the past tense stem 'arvas-'.
